name: Red-Cabbage-and- Roquefort Slaw
keywords: cabbage, mayonnaise, roquefort cheese, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cups finely chopped fresh parsley (about 4 bunches)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove a few outer leaves of the cabbages, rinse, dry and use to line a large serving bowl. Quarter and core cabbages; cut wedges crosswise into thin shreds. Place in a large bowl with 1 1/2 cups parsley and 1 cup cheese.

Combine mayonnaise and mustard in a medium bowl and whisk until blended. Pour into cabbage mixture and toss to coat. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and parsley. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.
